body: Some weapon qualities and some specific weapons have an extra effect on a critical hit. This special effect also functions against creatures not normally subject to critical hits. On a successful critical roll, apply the special effect, but do not multiply the weapon's regular damage.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Magic Arms and Armor/Weapon Special Abilities/Weapon Special Abilities/Magic Weapons and Critical Hits
name: Magic Weapons and Critical Hits
